details.judgement: The edit type exactly matches ("capitalization"), fulfilling criterion 1. Regarding the text content, the predicted edit "why" → "Why" correctly captures the core capitalization change indicated by the ground truth edit "why did he dine" → "Why did he dine". The prediction focuses directly on the essential change (only the capitalization of the initial word), correctly representing the intention of the original edit. Thus, both criteria for correctness (edit type and text content accuracy) are satisfied.
